Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [telegram] <RiceNPea> I have KMD in paper wallet from a year ago. Should I move to Agama? Is this how I claim interest? (re @sreinhardt: This is hard without a crystal ball. I think this year 51% attacks are going to be big and more and more projects are going to look to KMD for solutions. I think our atomic swap work and DEX work could also bring in good attention (it should, we haven't gotten nearly the credit for it). That being said I think with the way our chart is looking we'll ATH against BTC this year but I have no idea what BTC will do. It should also ATH but these cycles are typically 18 to 24 month cycles and there are so many other variables involved outside of the tech. I have no idea what the USD price will be this year but if BTC does it's thing and we do our thing I see no reason we couldn't hit $25. If BTC bellyflops going into 2020... man... I could still see us hitting ATH in SATs and being at $2. Too many unknowns but guessing is fun. Either way, I'm in... it's all a matter of time. If not 2019 then 2020. No big deal. The tech is real and the world needs it.)

Content: [telegram] <Regnar> You're likely going to have to update ledger firmware and all that to get ledger itself up to date. If you were accruing rewards it stopped accruing after month one.
